Title: Aerial Challenges
Description:
<Flaps flaps his wings excitedly, dropping both a note and a singed rodent at your feet.>

Dragonrider! Your flight prowess has become well known. Come test yourself in Aerial Challenges across the Dragon Isles.

Speak to any Bronze Timekeeper to get started.
ObjectivesText: Speak to a Bronze Timekeeper to learn about aerial challenges.
RewardText:
Another challenger? Welcome! 

Aerial Challenges are timed races on courses throughout the Dragon Isles. Beat track times to earn your rank.
